item.description:
LADIES... join us for a Women's-Only Obstacle Adventure Run!! 

We have signed up for the 10:30 start wave and our Team Name is "S. Shore Lunachicks"  ***Register soon to join us in that wave!!**

Cost is $50.  MUST pick up bib # in advance, BUT can pay $10 extra to have everything mailed out to you. 

ALSO!! COUPON CODE! Save $10 by using: DIVAHANNAH at checkout.

To register for this race & for additional information click on:

http://divadash.com/

But remember to select start wave 10:30 with the

 TEAM NAME:

***"S. Shore Lunachicks"***

(info copied from website): Info – What Is It? SHAPE Diva Dash: A Women’s-Only Obstacle Adventure Run!

You know you want to. You know you’re tough enough. You know it’s going to be the most fun you’ve had in your running shoes.

Get your smile muscles trained up, because they are going to get a workout at the SHAPE Diva Dash! You are about to embark on an adventurous women-only obstacle race. That’s right. You will jump, climb, swing, and DASH your way to the finish line where even more contests and prizes await at the after party. Three miles of road and trail will challenge and surprise you as you battle to be the fastest adventure diva! Of course, we will try to slow you down with fun obstacle courses along the way.

Sign up with your favorite ladies so you can be in the same starting wave together. You may choose from up to 20 starting waves, each 15 minutes apart. It’s a race against the clock! Each diva gets a 100% cotton t-shirt, a drawstring backpack, and lots of other goodies, and there’s plenty of other prizes for our top finishers.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Shape DIVA DASH!
